description: Payment method trends aggregated by week for time-series analysis

week_label.description: Human readable week label in format YYYY-WXX

payment_method.description: Payment method name (can include combined methods)

total_sales.description: Total sales value for this payment method in this week

total_transactions.description: Number of transactions for this payment method in this week

avg_transaction.description: Average transaction value for this payment method in this week

start_date.description: First date in this week period

end_date.description: Last date in this week period

usage: Used by Payment Method Trends chart with weekly interval for date range filtering and time-series visualization
